A world peace monument: If I had a magic pen that made anything I drew become real, I would draw a world peace monument. This is because I believe that the world needs more unity and harmony, and a monument dedicated to peace would be a powerful symbol of hope and change.

A garden of healing: I would draw a garden of healing, filled with beautiful flowers, trees, and other plants that have been known to have healing properties. This would be a place where people could come to relax, rejuvenate, and find peace.
A library: I would draw a massive library filled with books from all over the world. This would be a place where people could come to learn, grow, and expand their minds.

A community center: I would draw a community center that would provide a space for people to gather, connect, and work together. This would be a place where people could come to learn new skills, share ideas, and build a stronger community.

A time machine: I would draw a time machine that would allow people to travel through time and experience history firsthand. This would be a unique and exciting way for people to learn about the past and gain a deeper understanding of the world we live in today.
